Vanilla: Vanilla is known for its sweet and comforting scent.
PinkPeppercorn: Pink Pepper is known for its spicy and warm scent.
Amber: Amber is known for its warm and musky scent.
Calamus: Calamus is known for its sweet and spicy scent.
Cypriol: Cypriol is known for its earthy and woody scent.

paris: This product is crafted in Paris by Diptyque.
transparency: Full transparency about partners and origins of raw materials.
testBeforeBuy: A free sample with every order to try before unpacking the main perfume.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: This is a non-commercial website aimed at gathering interest in this perfume. Please note, it is not affiliated with Diptyque in any way, but created by fans of the brand.
